title: Flower Fables, Part 3 of 7
description:
Tonight, Elizabeth reads "Fable 3: The Flower's Lesson" and "Fable 4: Lily-Bell and Thistledown" from Flower Fables, by Louisa May Alcott, originally published in 1854.


Try The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepybookshelf.supercast.com/.
